group_1.textCenter: So Touka and Nemu's plan is to assign each@of the Feathers to a [textBlue:Rumor]...
And prioritize securing emotional energy.
But Alina wants to tell Magical Girls of @their fate to become Witches.
That way we can secure energy by manifesting@Doppels.
At the same time, we would raise powerful@Witches to serve as our defense...
Is that about right?
Well...

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textCenter: The Feathers you've gotten wrapped up in this@are scared.
You're the ones who should be leading them.@You have to keep it together!

group_1.textLeft: First off, Alina.
He who chases two rabbits catches neither,@or so they say.
We mustn't be greedy.
And Touka and Nemu...
I understand that you want to ensure we get@energy from the [textBlue:Rumors].
But don't you think you were getting a bit@too emotional just now?

group_1.textCenter: No...

group_1.textLeft: To me you always seem very logical.
But when it comes to [textBlue:Rumors], you seem to @get very emotional.
You're responsible for bringing all of us@together, so you need to be careful.
That said, neither of your claims is wrong.
This is only my opinion...
But I think perpetually increasing the number@of [textBlue:Rumors] is a good thing.
Unlike Witches, they aren't well-known.
And until now, [textBlue:Rumors] that don't cause any@harm haven't been destroyed.
As for the Feathers, let's only assign them@where they can harvest energy efficiently.

group_1.textCenter: Okay.

group_1.textRight: We have room to consider it.

group_1.textLeft: Now, about the Witches...
We must make sure we have Grief Seeds so@that we can nurture Eve.
But don't you think it's unnecessary to@spread the truth about Witches?
It'll only bring about needless despair.
We only enlist girls who already know they@are destined to turn into Witches.
Isn't that enough?

group_1.textRight: I, Alina, think it is fine so long as we get@more Doppels from their despair...
But since it's you suggesting this, Mifuyu,@I suppose I can allow it.

group_1.textLeft: I appreciate it. What about you two? Are you@okay with this plan?

group_1.textCenter: Hm... Yes, I think you make a valid point.

group_1.textRight: I apologize for my behavior. I have no@objections to this plan.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
If we all agree, then I'll let the Feathers@know.

group_1.textCenter: *Sigh*
(I managed to get things settled for now.)
(The problem is that they each have such@strong personalities...)
(If I wasn't here to stop them, they might@destroy everything from the inside out.)

group_1.textRight: Thank you for your wonderful work in@explaining matters to the Feathers.

group_1.textLeft: A Grief Seed?

group_1.textRight: Your Soul Gem looks quite cloudy.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
(Probably because I've been stressing about@going back to see Yachan.)
Thank you, I really appreciate it.

group_1.textRight: I do apologize for intruding when you weren't@feeling well.
Please rest as much as you need. Goodbye...

group_1.textLeft: (I'm the one responsible for bringing@Tsukuyo into the Wings of the Magius.)

group_1.narration: Plenty of other Feathers besides her@joined because of their faith in me...@I'm a Magical Girl who's survived@for a long time, after all.

group_1.textCenter: They'd never forgive me if I deserted them@now.

group_1.narration: They'd feel like I'd betrayed@them by running away...@Some might even fall back into despair.
Girls who join the Feathers@tend to be quite fragile.@There's a chance they can't handle it...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:100601:lipSynch_1]*Sigh*
I can't go back to Yachan.
I have too much responsibility with the@Wings of the Magius to leave...
